mapper.sql: id, username, password, name, phone, createtime, updatetime, deleted
mapper.insert: insert into admin (id, username, password, name, phone, createtime, updatetime, deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update admin
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIME},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIME},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update admin set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIME}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIME}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from admin order by id
